sentences.sContent: Michael has already spent considerable time in Barcelona.
sentences.sCn: 迈克尔在巴塞罗那已经待了相当长的时间了。

sentences.sContent: The series has aroused considerable interest.
sentences.sCn: 这套系列节目引起了观众相当浓厚的兴趣。

synos.tran: 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的

words.tran: 经过深思熟虑的；被尊重的

trans.tranCn: 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的
trans.tranOther: fairly large, especially large enough to have an effect or be important
